name: Concert of acts; effect on jurisdiction
text: §380-5  Concert of acts; effect on jurisdiction.  No court of the State shall have jurisdiction to issue a restraining order or temporary or permanent injunction upon the ground that any of the persons participating or interested in a labor dispute constitute or are engaged in an unlawful combination or conspiracy because of the doing in concert of the acts enumerated in section 380-4. [L 1963, c 200, §5; Supp, §90B-5; HRS §380-5]
